message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this item. We're willing to extend a special introductory offer of $12000 for this exceptional product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price of $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, but I must respectfully decline the counteroffer. Our company has invested significantly in this product, and we need to ensure we cover our costs. I propose we continue our discussion with an offer of $11000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am comfortable proceeding with a purchase at $10000. I hope this proposal works for you.
